name: The National Association of Disabled's Enterprises

address: Ground floor,Kannamwar Municipal Marathi School No.1, Kammamwar Nagar I,

briefDescription: We provide training/employment/self-employment and other welfare services to unemployed disabled persons like Visually Challenged, Orthopaedically Challenged, Hearing Impaired and Mentally Challenged persons.  To achieve this goal, we undertake manufacturing of various products as well as service contracts through various Govt Departments & Undertakings, Companies, Educational Institutions, Business Groups, etc.We also guide, train and  support groups of   disabled persons to set up and run their own Disabled's Cooperatives  and Business Enterprises to solve their unemployment problem.We also provide various welfare services for the benefit of disabled persons and their family members like educational assistance, medical assistance, etc
